summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game set in a dimly lit, rocky cave environment. A character, dressed in a shaggy, nature-inspired outfit and wielding a staff, stands on a grassy ledge. The background features wooden scaffolding and torches, suggesting a path or area to explore. The user interface displays a health bar in the bottom left corner, along with an icon labeled "Evil Repelling Medicament," indicating the player has 9 of these items. In the bottom right, there are four ability icons labeled 1 to 4, and additional icons for actions or abilities mapped to the keys F and T. A red circle with a dot in the center highlights a point of interest in the distance, possibly indicating an objective or target.
